sentences: Me kobisime koju enne päikest tõusmist.
context: The Estonian verb 'kobi' is an imperative form of the verb 'kobima'. It means to climb into something, to go somewhere quickly (usually implying climbing), and can also refer to crawling or getting in and out of vehicles. The word has various contextual meanings including climbing into beds, cars, boats, as well as crawling under tables. In some contexts it can also mean to rummage through pockets or belongings.
